2.info: Selected a place on the map and showed the bottom sheet.

4.info: Enabled the "Night mode" in the setting.

warnings.2: Cancelled a place on the map and hid the bottom sheet.
warnings.4: Disabled the "Night mode" in the setting.

all_events_happened: Should keep the state of Event 2 and enable the "Night mode" when enter "Nearby" again.
